document_data.name: Chocolate Crab Cake
document_data.basicrefs: {{Cite organized play/LC/Revenge Is Harder than Stone|3}}
document_data.refs2e: {{Cite organized play/LC/Revenge Is Harder than Stone|19}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Chocolate crab cakes''' were a peculiar brand of [[gnome|gnomish]] highsunfeast dessert from the city of [[Ravens Bluff]] in [[the Vast]].
document_data.Description: Chocolate crab cakes were a sweet variant of regular [[crab cake]]s, fried and dipped in a thick [[chocolate syrup]] that formed a shell round them. The dish tasted unique, while others called it delicious.
document_data.History: Chocolate crab cakes were the specialty dish of a gnomish out-of-the way café in Ravens Bluff called [[Le PoTeete Café]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]]. Less adventurous customers preferred the other dessert on the menu - simple [[berry bowl]]s.
